data.name: Stream Animals: Free For All
data.detailed_description:
** Stream Animals only works for Twitch.tv Streamers **

Stream Animals brings you closer to your streaming community. Take on your viewers and try to be the last one standing as the land gives way beneath you.

Your viewers use your streaming channel chat to decide their moves. Then the fun begins as random or voted events trigger falling blocks, player fights, or birds swooping from above!

As the last animal standing, it doesn’t always mean you’re the winner. If the birds and players don’t get you, events can still take you out!

For Non-Streamers: If you'd like to customize your appearance for when you join streams on Twitch, there is an in-game store and customization section.

Features

  • Play with your stream chat through Twitch.
  • Viewers can vote on events.
  • 3 Game Modes: Classic, Battle, and Dash
  • Up to 64 players from your stream chat.
  • Map size scaling based on player count.
  • 15+ Events that can be toggled on/off
  • 10+ Map Layouts for Classic Mode with 3 scaling sizes
  • 10+ Map Themes for Classic Mode.

data.short_description: Stream Animals:Free for All brings you closer to your streaming community. You and your viewers try to be the last one standing as the land falls into the water.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7 or Later
  • Processor: Intel i5 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX970 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Computer must be able to handle streaming.
